maml:description.maml:para: Updates a project file version number.
This cmdlet will modify a project file with the information in the specified [Manifest] object. If the project file passed is not known it will be ignored.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
The project file. If the file type is unknown it will be ignored.
When present, any files modified by this cmdlet will be committed to source control.
When present, all files will be committed to source control.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
This is an alias of the InputObject parameter.
The project file. If the file type is unknown it will be ignored.
The project file. If the file type is unknown it will be ignored.
This is an alias of the ProjectFile parameter.
The project file. If the file type is unknown it will be ignored.
This is an alias of the ProjectFile parameter.
This is an alias of the Message parameter.
This is an alias of the Message parameter.
When present, any files modified by this cmdlet will be committed to source control.
When present, all files will be committed to source control.
This is an alias of the Name parameter.
This is an alias of the Version parameter.
This is an alias of the Version parameter.
The project file. If the file type is unknown it will be ignored.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example will update the project file version number then commit the changes to source control.

maml:description.maml:para: Select the version number from a manifest.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
This is an alias of the CurrentBranch parameter.
This is an alias of the CurrentBranch parameter.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
This is an alias of the Format parameter.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
This cmdlet incrments a [Manifest] object's version number.
This example increments version number then saves it back to disk.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
When present, the major version number will be incremented.
When present, the minor version number will be incremented.
When present, the patch version number will be incremented.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.
When present, the major version number will be incremented.
When present, the minor version number will be incremented.
When present, the patch version number will be incremented.
The file-path or instance of a [Manifest] object.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example increments version number then saves it back to disk.
